description: "Heroes Stand Tall: M.E.T.A" thrusts you into the heart of the immersive Digiverse. In the HST Arena, players engage in intense PvP deathmatches, wielding diverse weapons as Heroes. Victory requires strategic prowess and precise aim. Embrace the M.E.T.A, Be A Hero and Stand Tall.

name: The Throne
description: "The Throne" is a medieval adventure in true Metroidvania style. Get lost in a huge castle with 2.5D pixel art environments and increase your power with new abilities you find along the way. Fight fearsome bosses and navigate dangerous traps to make your way to the throne room!

name: Where the Anemones Bloom
description: Cordelia leads a life that most mermaids would envy. She has close friends and is part of a prominent pod, her future is all planned out. But Cordelia isn‚Äôt most mermaids. When her pod moves to the coast, she‚Äôs warned about the forbidden shallows and the dangers that lurk beyond. She‚Äôs heard all the rumours of course, but none of her friends will go near it. Curiosity gets the better of Cordelia, and she soon finds herself trembling at the fearful lights and hum of this strange city. However, something - someone actually - has also caught her eye. What starts as mere curiosity blossoms into something far more interesting. Soon Cordelia questions who she really is, and what she really wants. As she ventures further into uncharted territory, she gets closer to love but further from who she is and what she knows. Will she risk it all for a taste of the forbidden?

name: Oh My Cod!!: We Mer-Made For Each Other!
description:
Elise, an introverted marine biology student wins a 3 month trip to Papua New Guinea to study the Coral Sea! However, upon her first expedition, she meets a mermaid caught in plastic in the waters who offers to teach her all about life deep under the surface from a first-hand-resident. Elise eagerly takes this opportunity to learn, and the opportunity to talk to a charming girl her age!

She might be sacrificing facts for fondness because her source unfortunately isn‚Äôt very reliable‚Ä¶

name: Four Second Forever

name: DeMonkey
description: This is a GTAG fan game where you can (so far) talk to your friends! but it's not always just talking... But also to play infection!

name: Fastival

name: Homebound Mariana

The lemon shark tailed mermaid warrior Kaisa is out on her daily patrol when she notices that the sea is somehow... upset. The balance of nature has been disturbed, and monsters of the deep have been let loose into the salty waters.

On top of that, a nearby research submarine is broadcasting an emergency signal. Kaisa sets out to investigate, and hopefully find answers and solutions. Restoring the balance of the ocean is up to her!

A Global Game Jam 2018 entry

An apartment building. Four different homes. A most awkward crime.

As the manager, you have to listen to your neighbors to solve an enigma. Can you do it?

description:
Zean, the alien, has only one goal in this strategy game: Reach the bell. His mission starts out simple. A simple world with only him and a bell. There is nothing more. How will he reach it?

It is up to you, the player, to figure out what Zean has to do to reach the bell.

A game that started out as a game created for a game jam, now fully playable.

A short 1 level platforming game made entirely from strata cut clay. Play as a neuron delivering information to the brain core, destroy neurons with sparks of electricity when they get in your way. Press 'F' to fire electricity, Arrow keys to move, 'space' to jump.

Music by Miles Pride.

TW: flashing colors

This DLC unlocks Episode 3 of The Pepper Prince: Seasoning 1, a quirky point-and-click adventure about love, grief, and the power of friendship. Solve puzzles, meet quirky fairy-tale-inspired characters, and help your friend regain confidence and self-love after heartbreak!

Lover's Peak is a place full of memories and stories. Somewhere among them, you will find the key leading you back to your friend the pepper prince.

name: The Cold Case
description:
You're one of our best element but were put in here after some ... trouble in your previous investigation.

You have a natural detective mind and are able to visualize the situation from the data noted during the investigation.

Put your experience to use and you may have the right to get back on the field

Alan works in Sentient Resources for the Dark Lord Xysryhfrx, and it appears multiple monsters in the underdungeon have claimed to have killed Gordon Lightshield, mid-level hero, in order to claim the eon-end bonus.

What's more annoying than the noise made by a Roomba? NOTHING! It's never a Shiba Inu's responsibility to withstand such an artificial "idiot."

Because you know what... they can ONLY turn RIGHT! So loud and unintelligent, the robot doesn't deserve to stay at my house. It's time to throw it out.

Roomba OUT! is a strategy game where the player needs to control the Shiba Inu to "guide" the Roomba out of the house, based on the fact that the idiot robot can only turn right when facing obstacles.

Eternal life is a fascinating thing forever.

A long time ago, there were three mysterious islands hidden in the mist-shrouded sea. The ancient Chinese emperor Qin Shi Huang once sent Xu Fu to the east to find these islands, where the supreme secret of eternal life was hidden, but Xu Fu never returned......

What happened in between? Try to find the answer.......

An expesive diamond has stolen from a museum. Your job is determinate whose stole the diamond and at what time.There are 5 suspects in the diamond theft.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
description:
Developed by Treyarch and Raven, Black Ops 6 is a spy action thriller set in the early 90s, a period of transition and upheaval in global politics, characterized by the end of the Cold War and the rise of the United States as a single superpower. With a mind-bending narrative, and unbound by the rules of engagement, this is signature Black Ops.

The Black Ops 6 Campaign provides dynamic moment-to-moment gameplay that includes a variety of play spaces with blockbuster set pieces and action-packed moments, high-stakes heists, and cloak-and-dagger spy activity.

In a best-in-class Multiplayer experience, players will test their skills across 16 new maps at launch, including 12 core 6v6 maps and 4 Strike maps that can be played 2v2 or 6v6.

Black Ops 6 also marks the epic return of Round-Based Zombies, the fan-favorite mode where players will take down hordes of the undead in two brand-new maps at launch. Post-launch, players can look forward to even more exciting maps and groundbreaking experiences dropping into both Multiplayer and Zombies.

name: Tiny Chao Garden DX
description:
Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2 had Chao Adventure. Sonic Adventure DX and Sonic Adventure 2: Battle had the Tiny Chao Garden. The Steam releases of those games have... nothing! That's where this project comes in. Designed to use the .chao format introduced by Fusion's Chao Editor and utilized by krzys2's Chao Exporter/Importer, this game allows you to interact with your Chao just like in the original Tiny Chao Garden!

More than just a simple recreation, Tiny Chao Garden DX has new enhancements and will feature more in the future! You can view a Chao's stats by opening the full menu, view item stats and descriptions in the shop and store your goods in a new inventory system.

Makoto doesn't have any money but has been skirting the law for some time through tax evasion, abuse of Japan's basic "National Pension System", and odd jobs or "gigs" working under the table, becoming more behind on his fiscal obligations by the day. However, there is another odd phenomenon that has developed in Wakui City that Makoto did not immediately become aware of known as the "New Stalking Law", which grants protection and partial asylum to qualified candidates who have garnered the attention of unscrupulous parties. This system was put in place at Wakui City to divert resources to an emerging problem that the local police could not manage on their own, and is designed for rather extreme cases. In order for it to work, the "PG (Public Guardian) System" was created to assign benefactors who perform tasks on the behalf of their clients.

description:
Dive into the immersive roguelite RPG experience of Halls of Greed where every decision shapes your fame and fortune. Halls of Greed delivers a thrilling blend of intense PvPvE combat, the hunt for rare loot, and strategic extraction mechanics that will keep you coming back for ‚Äújust one more round.‚Äù

Set in a world teeming with ancient magic and sinister creatures, players will embark on perilous journeys to extract valuable treasures from treacherous dungeons. But beware, fellow adventurers lurk in every shadow, ready to thwart your progress and claim the spoils for themselves.

Create characters from a diverse selection of classic fantasy archetypes, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Will you embrace the devastating spells of the mage, the discipline of the knight, the precision of the ranger, or the ferocity of the primalist? Each class offers a distinct approach to how you dominate the battlefield. Whether you're engaging in one-on-one duels or clashing with rival parties in team-based skirmishes, every encounter offers unique advantages and disadvantages so choose wisely!

However, the true measure of success lies in your ability to collect rare and powerful loot scattered throughout the crypts, castle ruins, and dungeons. Uncover legendary weapons, enchanted artifacts, and valuable resources that will enhance your abilities and secure your dominance on the battlefield. Be sure to extract through one of the magical portals using a keystone and return to camp where you can improve your character, level up your loadout, and give yourself key advantages for the next run!

name: Cabin Crew Life Simulator
description: Welcome to Cabin Crew Simulator, the pioneering flight attendant simulator by SOGA Std. Dive into the glamorous world of aviation and kickstart your career by ensuring passenger satisfaction and safety. Navigate through exciting tasks on each flight, from serving gourmet meals to managing in-flight emergencies, providing an unparalleled passenger experience.

name: Rocket Panda
description: Enter a thrilling journey to save Biscuit Land from the clutches of the wicked Biscuit Head! Join Rocket Panda and his loyal band of Badgers as they take flight to rescue their kidnapped comrades and reclaim their homeland.

name: Meet Me at The Workers' Club
description:
An interactive reconstruction of Alexander Rodchenko's Workers' Club, originally exhibited at the 1925 World Expo in Paris.

The virtual copy of the constructivist installation is accompanied by posters, photographs, and breezy texts tracing the historical context of workers' clubs in the Soviet Union, as well as personal musings about the role of the artist in a time of revolution.

The game functions as a walking simulator or interactive art exhibit, and players can look at individual works to find out more.

name: Twisted Screens
description: In Twisted screens, you take control of Tessa an employee of Razzycat entertainment as she find herself in the Abandoned ATR facility with horrible experiments running loose in the facility. Tessa must team up with A.I companion Legsy to escape.

name: Major League Curveball
description: Welcome to the Major Leagues! In Major League Curveball, you dodge, strike, and get smashed by homing balls as you compete against players in this fast-paced, last player standing sports brawler.

name: Unpossess
description: Unpossess is a 1-4 co-op exorcism simulator game set in the early 1900s. Players take on the role of exorcists responsible for addressing cases of human possession.

name: Cupiclaw
description: Cupiclaw is a roguelike deckbuilding claw machine game. Grab, sell and add prizes in order to take on increasingly expensive new machines, until you manage to recover Morris' lost engagement ring!

name: Brass
description: As the player, you take on the role of Brass, delivering letters and packages while interacting with the villagers. One day, a letter from his grandma sets Brass off on a new adventure. With relaxing, story-driven gameplay and adorable low-poly art, Brass offers a cozy and heartwarming experience.

name: Pavement Pummel
description: Welcome to Pavement Pummel, an exhilarating multiplayer physics-based bike racing game. Engage in thrilling races against players worldwide across diverse landscapes. Master the art of strategy, skill, and speed. Navigate through city streets, mountain trails, or off-road terrain.

name: RiseExplosion
description: Easy rolling action game. Surmount the obstacles to get to the goal.

name: DeafBlind
description: DeafBlind offers an immersive sensory deprivation experience, simulating what life might feel like if you were both deaf and blind. This game invites you to navigate a world shrouded in silence and darkness, challenging you to adapt and explore in entirely new ways.

name: Naomi Clicker
description: Naomi Clicker is a simple illustration collecting game. Click on Naomi and collect & combine items to collect Naomi‚Äôs illustrations!

name: Bodacious Babes: Holidays
description: The Bodacious Babes are heading home this holiday season, come meet all the girls. Work your way through over 30 unique puzzle levels to unlock 100+ HOT and SEXY photos of the babes.

name: Arena of Block Puzzle
description: A puzzle game The game has no upper limit on points, no time limit, no operational requirements, just thinking about it As the score increases, the difficulty will also become increasingly difficult. Come challenge your brain's limits!

name: Mineral
description: A minimalist sci-fi physics based ball-rolling puzzle game. Use abilities and gather collectables to solve puzzles and unlock secrets!

name: Where is Love?
description: "Where is Love?" is a dark, choice-driven comedy that questions love and family, with a painful sting in your nostrils and the acrid aftertaste of vodka.

name: The Month After
description: Loot, survive and PVP in a vast zombie infested city. Who knows you might make it to an extract.

name: The Legend Beyond Legends
description: A 3D or Pop-Up book adventure classic Point & Click game about strange legends. Challenge myths, receive powers, find the missing fisherman, and become a legend! 1-2 hours of gameplay for the entire family, original sound track, and great plot twist

name: Ultra Mushroom
description: Hey! Wanna rise to the top at a festival stall? "Ultra Mushroom" is a high-energy game where you run a mushroom stall at a three-day festival and see how much you can earn. Gather mushrooms in the mountains by day and sell them at night. The key? Rhythmic banter and Ultra Mushrooms that bring joy!

name: Elfengard Hunter Slayer
description: Welcome to the world of Elfengard. You will follow the journey to discover how the hero ended up in this fantasy world full of monsters.

name: Hare Trigger
description: Play as a bunny with a gun in this fast-paced side-scrolling shooter. Your job? To destroy as many helicopters as you can.

name: Erocism
description: In order to exorcise them full of vagina, they have to be purified with the main character's energy. Please find clues to help drive out the ghosts from their bodies!

name: Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade
description: "City building" and "Trade" simulation game by Rota, the princess of the forest country! Rota strives to realize her plan for sea trade with the entire world. Let's greatly develop the port town of Portamare through the production, import and export of goods, and business negotiation battles!

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 2
description: Underworld teams, big consumers of warpstone infusions and mushrooms from the remotest parts, welcome Goblins, Skaven, Trolls, Rat Ogres and Snotlings. These outcasts take their revenge on life by humiliating the richest teams.

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 3
description: Representing the traditionalist class of necromancy, these teams pick their players from the cream of the beyond, especially a thousand year-old Mummies, whitened Skeletons and starving Ghouls. And yet, they do not scorn a freshly risen Zombie, if he is stolen from the opposing team!

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 4
description: Wood Elf teams are incredibly popular, as they‚Äôre known to put on an impressive show ‚Äì they‚Äôre just as likely to (literally) dance circles around their rivals as they are to get smashed in (literally) spectacular fashion. They play the game better than just about anyone else, and they look stunning while they‚Äôre at it.

name: The Pepper Prince: Seasoning Pass (Episode 2-5)
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Ding Dong Dang
description: Ding Dong Dang is the most interesting casual MMO game! Series of the Crayon Shin-chan are waiting for discovery! There are three islands here to explore. Each island has its own style. Double fun to invite friends to play together! Ding Dong Dang will definitely bring you infinite happiness!

name: Punch Max
description: Dive into the action with Max, a boxer with extraordinary abilities, in a city overrun by dark forces.

name: DeathTower
description: Wake up, Ikarus! DeathTower is an overclocked roguelite tactical RPG. Survive each floor of the megastructure. Stealth, hacking, devastating weapons... Do whatever it takes to fight your way to the top.

name: Goblin Kart Rescue
description: Goblin Kart Rescue is a top-down racing game, with 24 short but challenging tracks against a CPU opponent. After saving all the princesses by winning in story mode, try beating your own time in Time Attack, or see how many races you can clear in the difficult Endless mode!

name: Shadow of the School
description: The player finds himself in an abandoned school, which was once a place of study for local schoolchildren. The protagonist is a paranormal researcher who came here to solve the mystery that shrouds this gloomy location.

name: Intimate Abode
description: "Discover a unique experience of self-discovery and pleasure in the game 'Intimate Abode'. Explore your apartment and enjoy intimate moments in different locations, trying out different dildos and dildos. Release your sensuality and immerse yourself in a journey of personal pleasure."

name: Blue Land
description: Craft, fight, explore, and play with your friends! In this Open-World, 2D, CO-OP experience, you can do that all! The choice is yours...

name: Unknown Rules
description: Unknown Rules is an independently created multiplayer online horror game that supports 1-4 players.

name: Silverpine Creek
description: Explore the chilling village of Silverpine Creek, trapped in fog and fear. Unravel its dark history as a reporter trapped within, facing the malevolent witch Korana. Realtime Physics gameplay, immersive VHS-style visuals, and reactive AI heighten the suspense in this harrowing tale of survival.

name: Spidertronic
description: In Spidertronic the player gets to take control of a robotic spider moving through a world of isometric levels. Each level consists of tiles that make out the spider's web. Problem is that the web is under siege by odd spherical creatures. This has lead to some passageways being broken and now it's up to our little spider to repair the damage done. The aim then is to rebuild these parts of each level so that the spider can move on to the next. This is done with the use of coloured tiles. The HUD shows a flashing dot that indicates what colour is needed. The spider then has to find a tile in that colour and move it to the tile that needs to be repaired. Once this is all done the spider gets access to a teleporter and can move on to the next level. The spider isn't alone however. It has to be careful not to come into contact with the balls that move around the web. Balls can be destroyed by building a web in front of them. They won't be gone for long though since they will respawn after just a few seconds.

name: Shadows in the City
description:
Discover the hidden secrets of NeoCity in "Shadows in the City", the detective novel that immerses you in a world of mystery, conspiracy and futuristic science. He accompanies intrepid detective Alex Mercer as he confronts the shadows that lurk in the alleys of this futuristic metropolis.

Facing corporate conspiracies, political corruption, and banned scientific experiments, Mercer will unravel the truth behind the disappearance of scientist Claire Reynolds. The city, a crucible of technological advances and hidden shadows, becomes the scene of an epic confrontation between light and darkness.

name: Cold Shift
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Burnt Legacy
description: A detective document game where you sift through papers to try and piece together the case.

name: Evocation
description: In a small cul-de-sac neighborhood lives a group of 3 middle-school aged friends. Together, they share a treehouse where they hang out after school. All is well, until one day they notice a portrait of themselves hung up on the wall with a fourth person they've never seen before. Who could this mysterious boy be, and how did he show up in their lives? The answer, once known, may never be remembered...

name: Outbreak
description: Zombies. Sabotage. A stolen cure. Do you have what it takes to outwit ‚Äì and outlast ‚Äì hordes of enemies as you fight for survival? Get ready for Outbreak, the newest adrenaline-packed adventure from Zero Latency VR.

name: Singularity
description: Enter an immersive, science fiction shooter on a station stranded in the depths of space. Fight to the death against killer robots as you explore narrow corridors, treacherous lifts and zero-gravity environments. You will need to work together with your squad to get out alive, and find the answers you're looking for.

name: Engineerium
description:
Enter an ancient, alien world where gravity is not as it seems.

This is the fun, puzzling virtual reality walking journey that'll leave you questioning your own reality!

name: Ifu
description:
South Africa, 1900: A man is brought to a field hospital wounded and on the verge of death. A volunteer nurse saves him.

A point and click game of memory and deduction. Thematically, it is an exploration of trauma and forgiveness. The game takes place in an alternate history version of the Second Boer War/South African War

name: Cloning Chaos
description: Another day, another job. You work as a Solo - a contract killer. Today is June 30, 3030. Eladia Volante, the Operations Specialist at Suto-Shira, has contacted you at Gikhusko Tower, the hotel where you and the other freelance Solos are registered for hire. Apparently Suto-Shira's cofounder, Ken Suto, was found dead at Shenzen Industrial Area this morning. Eladia wants you to do what you do best - find the killer and give him what's coming to him.

name: Dear Elonai
description: Travel back in time in Dear Elonai, a noir point and click game and try to avoid the death of your love live.

name: Talking in Circles
description: Try and free yourself from the curse that's bound your bloodline for centuries! Piece together clues from ancient tomes and long lost spirits to confront the Demon that has plagued you for so long.

name: Ball-it Hell
description: Dodge! Strike back! This is a fast-paced barrage arcade game. Move the character to dodge bullets. Pick the right time to strike bullets back and destroy enemies to get gold coins. Unlock more characters and powerful skills. Keep challenging yourself to get higher scores and rankings.

name: Who Shot James R. Burnside?
description: Use your deductive skills to solve the mystery of who shot James R.Burnside!

name: Burning Questions
description: Save the burning evidence.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: JCB Equipment Pack
description: Experience the power and versatility of JCB machinery as you tackle challenging construction and agricultural projects across Europe. From powerful excavators, fully electric machines, and power generators to rugged loaders, each JCB machine offers a unique blend of performance and precision.

name: American Truck Simulator: JCB Equipment Pack
description: Experience the power and versatility of JCB machinery as you tackle challenging construction and agricultural projects across the USA. From powerful excavators, fully electric machines, and power generators to rugged loaders, each JCB machine offers a unique blend of performance and precision.

name: Archipelago Explorer
description:
Your sailing ship has been drifting with the tide for weeks - there is no wind.

Finally you dropped anchor near a chain of islands that you recognise - the Biuso Archipelago. The only information you have about the area is an unfinished book from one of your former shipmates.

You have been chosen to go ashore, figure out which island you‚Äôre on, and scope out possible water and food supplies.

name: A Detective Game
description: A simple clicker mystery with some fun art.

name: Detective Diaries
description:
"Detective Diaries" immerses you in a riveting murder-solving adventure. Assume the role of Elena Volkov, determined to uncover the truth behind her father's chilling murder in an isolated Arctic research center.

Explore the frozen corridors, interrogate suspects, and solve puzzles to unravel the complex web of relationships, deceit, and hidden motives. The clock is ticking, and the Arctic holds more secrets than it lets on. Can you decipher the clues and unveil the dark truths hidden in the ice?

With its gripping narrative and challenging puzzles, "Detective Diaries" promises an unforgettable journey into the heart of mystery. Are you prepared to confront the chilling secrets concealed in the frozen Arctic landscape?

name: The Case of the Murdered Matriarch
description: A classic point-and-click noir murder mystery presented entirely within Google Slides.

name: Doctor Voldritch's experiment
description:
This game is not really intended for first time recreational hypnosis, LavLabs has an introduction to hypnosis and Mezmaglitter's new age route is better suited.

This is a sci fi visual novel intended to hypnotize you with suggestions/triggers and a bonus QnA at the end. For those not familiar with hypnosis, the game is suppose to relax you and make you calmer (think of it similar to a guided meditation app but with a science-y theme). I didn't make it with the intention for people new to hypnosis at all. Please research hypnosis before doing it, especially recreational hypnosis.

name: Saihai no Yukue
description: A battle adventure game for the Nintendo DS developed by Omega Force, known for the Musou/Warriors series, the game is based in the Battle of Sekigahara, where you play as Ishida Mitsunari against Tokugawa Ieyasu.

name: Mezma's Revenge
description: A new addition to the past hypnotic visual novels involving 2 new hypnotists, each with their own style. You can pick New Age Bloof for a meditative journey, Dr. Voldritch if you miss his devious mad scientist charm or if you want something more intense, Elijah, a scheming super villain who likes brainwashing.

name: Medivination
description:
A relaxing journey into the soul; Medivinations is a combination of meditation and divination, where the goal is not to predict the future but to ground yourself to the present. The goal is to be able to replay over and over again as each reading is random and up to you to decide if it works with your vibe or not as you're the true guide of your life, wanderer‚úß‚àò* ‚úßÔΩ•Ôæü

You will be guided by a funky little bunny to chill out and let go of stress with various calming readings from planets, tarot, zodiac and more!

It's a short game, about 3-5 minutes but can be replayed as each reading is random.

name: There's No Socks
description: Have you ever struggled to find the second sock? That's because there's no socks! There's No Socks is a hidden object game with a selection of 4 locations and random socks to find for each of them.

name: Escape from Somnium
description: Escape From Somnium is a fan-made AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES x Zero Escape crossover fan game, featuring over 5k words and high-resolution, 4K graphics.

name: What's on Agenda
description: A short, chill social clicker where you shape the narrative of the newly formed SARO Federation. Follow Jan Eteri, a prominent lawyer, and see how propaganda changes society's perception.
